dhc ⨳ about notes projects work

There was a time, long ago, when I worked in publishing, and back then I dabbled in literary translation. Years later, I also had a short-lived —and award-winning— stint in script writing and advertisement. And before the demise of silver halide film, I was an aspiring photographer. More recently, I occasionally publish art criticism in ArtNexus.
